thread.title: CERDEC takes next step to connect Wi-Fi, LTE and radios
thread.title_full: CERDEC takes next step to connect Wi-Fi, LTE and radios

title: CERDEC takes next step to connect Wi-Fi, LTE and radios
text:
08 CERDEC takes next step to connect Wi-Fi, LTE and radios 
C4ISR & Networks: At a summer C4ISR Ground Activity at Joint Base McGuire-Dix-Lakehurst, New Jersey, the Communications-Electronics Research, Development and Engineering Center (CERDEC) showed it was possible to send emergency medical information through a soldier radio and across a 4G LTE connection with no break in signal.
